alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:23PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Perry and west central Dallas Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 423 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Marion to near Marion Junction. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marion, Bogue Chitto, Vaiden, Marion Junction, Suttle, Perry County Correctional Center, Judson College, Radford, Vaiden Field Airport and Hazen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Birmingham.
